SELECT L.*, D.DEPTNAME, PR.NAME, LR.LECTUREBUILDING, LR.LECTUREROOM FROM LECTURE L LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPTNUM = L.DEPTNUM INNER JOIN PROFESSOR PR ON PR.USERNAME = L.USERNAME INNER JOIN LECTURE_ROOM LR ON LR.LECTUREBUILDING = L.LECTUREBUILDING AND LR.LECTUREROOM = L.LECTUREROOM
ORDER BY LECTURENUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPage}

SELECT L.*, D.DEPTNAME, SL.*, PR.NAME, LR.LECTUREBUILDING, LR.LECTUREROOM FROM STUDENT_LECTURE SL LEFT OUTER JOIN LECTURE L USING (LECTURENUM) INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPTNUM = L.DEPTNUM INNER JOIN STUDENT S ON S.USERNAME = SL.USERNAME INNER JOIN PROFESSOR PR ON PR.USERNAME = L.USERNAME INNER JOIN LECTURE_ROOM LR ON LR.LECTUREBUILDING = L.LECTUREBUILDING AND LR.LECTUREROOM = L.LECTUREROOM WHERE S.USERNAME = #{username} AND SL.YEAR = #{year} AND SL.SEMESTER = #{semester} ORDER BY L.LECTURENUM DESC

SELECT FL.*, L.*, D.DEPTNAME, PR.NAME, LR.LECTUREBUILDING, LR.LECTUREROOM FROM FAVORITE_LECTURE FL LEFT OUTER JOIN LECTURE L ON L.LECTURENUM = FL.LECTURENUM INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPTNUM = L.DEPTNUM INNER JOIN STUDENT S ON S.USERNAME = FL.USERNAME INNER JOIN PROFESSOR PR ON PR.USERNAME = L.USERNAME INNER JOIN LECTURE_ROOM LR ON LR.LECTUREBUILDING = L.LECTUREBUILDING AND LR.LECTUREROOM = L.LECTUREROOM WHERE FL.LECTURENUM NOT IN (SELECT LECTURENUM FROM STUDENT_LECTURE WHERE USERNAME = #{username}) AND FL.YEAR = #{year} AND FL.SEMESTER = #{semester} ORDER BY FAVORITENUM DESC
SELECT * FROM FAVORITE_LECTURE FL INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON L.LECTURENUM = FL.LECTURENUM WHERE FAVORITENUM = #{favoriteNum}
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(L.COMPLETIONGRADE), 0) FROM LECTURE L INNER JOIN STUDENT_LECTURE SL ON SL.LECTURENUM = L.LECTURENUM WHERE SL.USERNAME = #{username} AND SL.LECTURENUM != #{lectureNum}

SELECT * FROM LECTURE L LEFT OUTER JOIN STUDENT_LECTURE SL ON (SL.LECTURENUM = L.LECTURENUM) WHERE SL.USERNAME = #{studentLectureVO.username} AND ( (WEEKDAY = #{lectureVO.weekday} AND STARTTIME <= #{lectureVO.startTime} AND ENDTIME >= #{lectureVO.startTime}) OR (WEEKDAY = #{lectureVO.weekday} AND STARTTIME <= #{lectureVO.endTime} AND ENDTIME >= #{lectureVO.endTime}) )

SELECT L.*, D.DEPTNAME FROM STUDENT_LECTURE SL LEFT OUTER JOIN LECTURE L USING (LECTURENUM) INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPTNUM = L.DEPTNUM INNER JOIN STUDENT S ON S.USERNAME = SL.USERNAME WHERE S.USERNAME = #{username} AND SL.YEAR = #{year} AND SL.SEMESTER = #{semester} ORDER BY LECTURENUM DESC
